item.title: 300 million workers just shut down India.
item.description: The largest strike in human history, and most of the Western media barely whispered it. That silence is complicity in Modi’s war on workers’ rights. India’s general strike is the future that the billionaires and ruling class fears most.

item.title: Real MVP :)
item.description: Turkish qualifier Zeynep Sönmez captured hearts at the Australian Open. Mid-match against the 11th seed, she didn’t hesitate to rush to the aid of a ball girl who fainted in the Melbourne heat. ​Moments like these remind us that sportsmanship is the ultimate win. Zeynep went on to secure her first-ever main draw victory at the Australian Open, making history for Turkey in more ways than one. source https://www.instagram.com/global_news55/

item.title: "Age Verification" Is A Big Tech Lie
item.description: https://imgur.com/gallery/report-discord-palantir-connections-do-not-give-discord-id-if-you-havent-already-wd49Hl8https://youtu.be/g7VUAQtzEHU For those unaware, in March, Discord will now be requiring ID or Facial recognition verification to use their chat servers from now on. Those who fail to verify will be locked to "Teen Mode" with most of the functionality locked out from use. They are also using AI to comb through your personal conversations and server posts to estimate your age so that you can by pass the verification. However if you fail, you must provide an ID or facial scan. This is being Touted "For the Children," but we know that is the most insincere dog whistle in the history of politics. It's about data, control, and money above all else. With your ID and biometric data, they now know roughly how old you are, gender, location, and many other statistics that advertisers and others love to know. It always removes another step of anonymity from the internet. Infringing on our rights, and the freedom of speech, and to speak out against the actions of our and other governments. Back in 2025, between 70,000 and 2million people had their data, and IDs stolen from Discord due to a server breach. (The hackers claim 2million, Discord admins downplayed it to 70k.) Discord gave the data to a third party to verify, and it was the third party that got hacked. They have since dropped that party and partnered with Thiel, cofounder of Palantir. Which means Discord has lied to us three time already minimum. #1 They said they will keep our data, which is being handed over to 3rd party. #2 They said they would delete the data once age has been verified, the former company and Thiel are both known to never deleting data. #3 They said they don't monitor private servers and chats, yet now they say they are using AI to read your private servers and chats to determine your age. Finally, there is a rumor that they will be passing this data on to Government agencies upon request, including ICE. This goes more indepth to my explanation above https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oY-i2T-vO0M ArTechnica's Write-up (Thank you - @Scahrossar ) https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2026/02/discord-faces-backlash-over-age-checks-after-data-breach-exposed-70000-ids/ Here is Discord's official reply, which doubled down and made things worse https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XSpBTuOcyJc Discord responded again "Trust us bro" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQQQga-XuCk --Minor Update-- Sister Post Discord-Palantir connections - do not give Discord your ID if you haven't already. https://imgur.com/gallery/report-discord-palantir-connections-do-not-give-discord-id-if-you-havent-already-wd49Hl8
item.dc:creator: Imadethisaccounttopost

As it was pointed out, it is actually okay that I dont know everything, especially if it's a meme phenomenon that isn't even in my own shithole country. So im still here. But it was nice to take a short break from memes and work on the mildly tedious new No Man's Sky Expedition: Tonka Truck Sandbox.

item.title: GovBrief Today #379
item.description: Most DHS departments shut down at midnight because Democrats say ICE's abuses must be halted. ICE suspended two agents for lying under oath about the shooting of a man in Minneapolis. But suspending federal agents who shoot someone and lie about it is not enough. Agents are following protesters home and rousting them where they live. ICE subpoenaed top tech companies today demanding the identities of hundreds of social media users criticizing them online. Their detention facilities are inhumane, according to Rep. Jamie Raskin (D-MD), who made a surprise visit to one in Baltimore where 60 men were packed into a single room with one toilet and no showers. The room set aside for dangerous criminals was empty. Things may soon get worse with ICE spending $38 billion to convert industrial spaces like warehouses into 92,000 detention cells. Your senators are at home in their states now and don't return for nine more days. Call them, show up at their offices. Write if nothing else. They need to hear from you that ICE needs to be corralled now. We've emailed 6,100+ stories over 379 straight nights. The algorithm doesn't always show them to you. Subscribe now at govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-iran-best [2] https://go.govbrief.today/boat-attack-feb13 [3] https://go.govbrief.today/rfk-leadership-change [4] https://go.govbrief.today/us-newborn-trial [5] https://go.govbrief.today/portland-residents-gas [6] https://go.govbrief.today/raskin-ice-baltimore [7] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-protesters-homes [8] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-golf-lawsuit [9] https://go.govbrief.today/voter-tool-errors [10] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-voter-id [11] https://go.govbrief.today/va-map-ruling [12] https://go.govbrief.today/dhs-critics-social-media [13] https://go.govbrief.today/lemon-plea [14] https://go.govbrief.today/unt-art-removed [15] https://go.govbrief.today/pentagon-claude-venezuela [16] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-bragg-speech [17] https://go.govbrief.today/doj-harvard-suit-records [18] https://go.govbrief.today/dhs-shutdown [19] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-agents-suspended [20] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-38b-expansion [21] https://go.govbrief.today/ssa-appointments [22] https://go.govbrief.today/texas-dmv-rule [23] https://go.govbrief.today/tps-yemen-ended [24] https://go.govbrief.today/libraries-passport [25] https://go.govbrief.today/gateway-funds-released [26] https://go.govbrief.today/court-ice-religion Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com

item.title: 'The Sweetheart Dance'
item.description: The Sweetheart Dance is a popular, often competitive, category in many Native American powwows, usually featuring couples dancing together in traditional regalia to honor companionship and love. Often held around Valentine’s Day or as part of winter powwows, this special event celebrates partnership, with winners sometimes decided by crowd applause or judges.
item.dc:creator: W0LFPAW
